channel.title: [317] npc help please [317]
channel.description:
Hi, i have added Many Npc's to my server but they currently all face South and i would like some of them to face west..How would i do this??? Please can somebody help... This is my autospawn.cfg
//--Barb village spawn = 12 3083 3416 0 3085 3418 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 12 3085 3419 0 3085 3418 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 12 3082 3417 0 3082 3418 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 12 3080 3422 0 3084 3418 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 17 3082 3424 0 3085 3418 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 17 3084 3417 0 3083 3417 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 199 3079 3443 0 3081 3441 3076 3441 1 gunthor_the_brave spawn = 12 3076 3444 0 0 0 0 0 1 barbarian spawn = 12 3078 3439 0 0 0 0 0 1 barbarian spawn = 17 3082 3432 0 0 0 0 0 1 barbarian spawn = 17 3075 3438 0 0 0 0 0 1 barbarian //--Varrock west spawn = 9 3175 3424 0 0 0 0 0 1 Guard spawn = 9 3173 3427 0 0 0 0 0 1 Guard spawn = 9 3174 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 Guard spawn = 494 3187 3436 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3187 3438 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3187 3440 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3187 3442 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3187 3444 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3187 3446 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3189 3443 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker

item.title: [317] npc help please [317]
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

When you added your npc.s you used the TAb button write? If you use the space bar for ya spaces, it doesn’t work, so do it again, but using the tab button.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] npc help please [317]
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

[quote=“r34p4g3pk, post:2, topic:270900”]At the; 1 near the npc name, test that out through 0-1-2-3, just test it out, like try changing it to 1, then try 2, then try, three.

spawn =   12   3083   3416   0   3085   3418   3085   3418   1   barbarian

Ahh thankyou… Thank you for this…

Read full topic

item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

At the; 1 near the npc name, test that out through 0-1-2-3, just test it out, like try changing it to 1, then try 2, then try, three.

item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

Hi, i have added Many Npc’s to my server but they currently all face South and i would like some of them to face west…How would i do this??? Please can somebody help…

This is my autospawn.cfg

//--Barb village spawn = 12 3083 3416 0 3085 3418 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 12 3085 3419 0 3085 3418 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 12 3082 3417 0 3082 3418 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 12 3080 3422 0 3084 3418 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 17 3082 3424 0 3085 3418 3085 3418 1 barbarian spawn = 17 3084 3417 0 3083 3417 3085 3418 1 barbarian
